decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly assemble the Omniscience Combo, allowing the player to cast spells without paying their mana cost. This enables the player to set up a lock on the opponent using Temporary Lockdown and other control cards, while also drawing cards and disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Confounding Riddle. The deck also includes ways to protect the combo pieces and generate value through cards like Fallaji Archaeologist and Meticulous Archive. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with overwhelming card advantage and control.

The key strategy of this deck is to control the board with removal spells like "Go for the Throat" and "Cut Down", while using powerful creatures like "Archfiend of the Dross" and "Sheoldred, the Apocalypse" to dominate the late game. The deck also focuses on hand disruption with cards like "Liliana of the Veil" and "Preacher of the Schism". Additionally, it utilizes cards like "Unholy Annex / Ritual Chamber" and "Dreams of Steel and Oil" to generate advantage and pressure the opponent. The overall goal is to maintain board control and overwhelm the opponent with big threats.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on utilizing creatures with high power and aggressive abilities to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By combining synergistic cards like Monstrous Rage and Burst Lightning with efficient creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Hired Claw, the deck aims to deal fast and consistent damage to the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Overprotect and Soulstone Sanctuary provides protection for key creatures, ensuring their longevity on the battlefield. With a strong mana base and a focus on aggression, this deck aims to win games quickly through relentless attacks.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game by using removal spells like Cut Down and Go for the Throat, while also disrupting the opponent's hand with Duress. The deck also focuses on generating card advantage and gaining life with cards like Anoint with Affliction and Soulstone Sanctuary. The win condition of the deck is to ultimately overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Archfiend of the Dross and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. Additionally, the deck includes utility lands like Blast Zone and Unholy Annex / Ritual Chamber to further control the battlefield.

The main focus of the deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with a combination of strong creatures and removal spells. The deck is designed to maintain a steady flow of threats while disrupting the opponent's strategy through removal and protection spells. By efficiently utilizing the mana ramp provided by Llanowar Elves and the dual lands, the deck aims to establish board control early on and apply pressure to the opponent. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Sheltered by Ghosts and Pawpatch Recruit enhances the deck's aggro strategy and helps to maintain tempo throughout the game.
